headline: Valuation Limits Upside for Illinois Tool Works (ITW), Goldman Says
summary: Illinois Tool Works Inc. (NYSE:ITW) is included among the 14 Best Dividend Growth Stocks to Buy and Hold in 2026. On December 16, Goldman Sachs downgraded Illinois Tool Works Inc. (NYSE:ITW) to Sell from Neutral and cut its price target to $230 from $258. The analyst described the company as well-run but said the shares […]
